DataSource.Query: SELECT SUM(checkout_details.price) AS total_sales, SUM(COALESCE(sales_view.discount, 0 )) AS total_discount, SUM(CASE WHEN items.is_taxable_item = 1 THEN COALESCE(checkout_details.tax, 0) END) AS total_tax, SUM(checkout_details.price) - SUM(COALESCE(sales_view.discount, 0 )) + SUM(CASE WHEN items.is_taxable_item = 1 THEN COALESCE(checkout_details.tax, 0) END) AS net_sales FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkout_details.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN account.users ON users.user_id = sales_view.salesperson_id LEFT JOIN inventory.items ON items.item_id = checkout_details.item_id WHERE users.user_id = @UserId AND users.deleted = 0 AND items.deleted = 0 AND sales_view.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To;

SELECT items.item_name, SUM(checkout_details.price) AS sales FROM sales.sales_view LEFT JOIN account.users ON users.user_id = sales_view.salesperson_id LEFT JOIN inventory.checkout_details ON checkout_details.checkout_id = sales_view.checkout_id LEFT JOIN inventory.items ON items.item_id = checkout_details.item_id WHERE users.user_id = @UserId AND users.deleted = 0 AND items.deleted = 0 AND sales_view.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To GROUP BY items.item_name;
